amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act to the Small Business Administration may be used for the Abraham Lincoln National Airport Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the Abraham Lincoln National Airport Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 318 (Roll no. 595).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Campbell (CA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 318 (Roll no. 595).
